es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.novelty.inverted.br

Class AlphaBayesRuleReranker<U,I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.novdiv.reranking.PermutationReranker<U,I>
      • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.novelty.inverted.br.BayesRuleReranker<U,I>
        • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.novelty.inverted.br.AlphaBayesRuleReranker<U,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    I - type of the items
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reranker<U,I>

    public class AlphaBayesRuleReranker<U,I>
extends BayesRuleReranker<U,I>
    Prior smoothed Bayesian probabilistic reformulation re-ranker. Estimation of likelihood and prior are based on the relevance scores of the recommender. S. Vargas and P. Castells. Improving sales diversity by recommending users to items.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)
